While <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G5607><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> the leper, <S%G3015><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> sat at the table, <S%G2621><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> an alabaster jar <S%G211><s%> of ointment <S%G3464><s%> of pure <S%G3487><s%> nard <S%G4101><s%> — very costly. <S%G4185><s%> She <S%G2532><s%> broke <S%G4937><s%> the jar, <S%G211><s%> and poured <S%G2708><s%> it over <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> who were <S%G2258><s%> indignant <S%G23><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> has <S%G1096><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> ointment <S%G3464><s%> been wasted? <S%G684><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> might <S%G1410><s%> have been sold <S%G4097><s%> for more than <S%G1883><s%> three hundred <S%G5145><s%> denarii, <S%G1220><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%>" They <S%G2532><s%> grumbled against <S%G1690><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Leave <S%G863><s%> her <S%G846><s%> alone. <S%G863><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G3930><s%> trouble <S%G2873><s%> her? <S%G846><s%> She has done <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

She <S%G846><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> she <S%G846><s%> could. <S%G2192><s%> She has anointed <S%G3462><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> beforehand <S%G4301><s%> for the burying. <S%G3778><s%>

Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> who was one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> went <S%G565><s%> away to <S%G4314><s%> the chief priests, <S%G749><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he might deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> he <S%G1437><s%> enters in, <S%G1525><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> the master of the house, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1320><s%> 'The Teacher says, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the guest room, <S%G2646><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I may eat <S%G5315><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%>"'

He <S%G846><s%> will himself show <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a large <S%G3173><s%> upper room <S%G508><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> and ready. <S%G2090><s%> Get ready <S%G2090><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>"

His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> went out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> things as <S%G2531><s%> he had said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they prepared <S%G2090><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>
When <S%G1096><s%> it was evening <S%G3798><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

As <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> sat <S%G345><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were eating, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G281><s%>, "Most certainly I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G3754><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> will betray <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> — he who <S%G3588><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>"

Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G3754><s%> I will no <S%G3361><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the fruit <S%G1081><s%> of the vine, <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I drink <S%G4095><s%> it <S%G846><s%> anew <S%G2537><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
When <S%G2532><s%> they had sung a hymn, <S%G5214><s%> they went out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G3754><s%> "All <S%G3956><s%> of you will be <S%G1722><s%> made to stumble <S%G4624><s%> because <S%G1722><s%> of me <S%G1698><s%> tonight, <S%G3571><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3960><s%> 'I will strike the shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> will be scattered. <S%G1287><s%>'
However, <S%G235><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> am raised <S%G1453><s%> up, <S%G3165><s%> I will go before <S%G4254><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>"

They <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> a place <S%G5564><s%> which was <S%G3739><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Gethsemane. <S%G1068><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Sit <S%G2523><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> I pray. <S%G4336><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> went forward <S%G4281><s%> a little, <S%G3397><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayed <S%G4336><s%> that, <S%G2443><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were <S%G2076><s%> possible, <S%G1415><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> might pass <S%G3928><s%> away from <S%G575><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> he went away, <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prayed, <S%G4336><s%> saying the same <S%G846><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>

Again <S%G3825><s%> he returned, <S%G5290><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> very heavy, <S%G916><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1492><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> know what <S%G5101><s%> to answer <S%G611><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Immediately, <S%G2112><s%> while he <S%G846><s%> was still <S%G2089><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> Judas, <S%G5607><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> — and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> swords <S%G3162><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> clubs, <S%G3586><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the chief priests, <S%G749><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders. <S%G4245><s%>
